multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the goal of backpropagation through time (BPTT)?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: To train the weights of an RNN to minimize the overall loss.
To unroll the RNN and compute the gradient with respect to each weight.
To propagate the loss through each individual time step.
